name: Temple Sprint
description:
Welcome to Temple Sprint, a tubular adventure about 

Use W, A, S, D to move, Left Click to Grapple, and Space-Bar to Jump

(The bridges are kind of a problem, but if you grapple about 10 feet above you while against a wall and move backwards from the wall, it will launch you up and you can use that to get past the bridge section. Not a great solution, but it would be kinda bad to patch that after the competition is over)

Markus G. - Programming

Chris G. - 3D Modelling and the Dumpster Fire OST

Sergio M. - 3D Modelling and Textures

Eric W. - Thumbnail Art, Textures, and Menu Art

OST on Soundcloud if you like bleeding ears:

https://soundcloud.com/chris-gemperle
